reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Great professor, explains concepts clearly and is always available for help.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Challenging course but Dr. Doe makes it interesting with practical examples.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Good lecturer but sometimes hard to follow. Labs are well-organized.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and supportive during office hours.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Excellent professor! His coding exercises really helped me understand the material.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Lectures are dry and exams are tough. Not very responsive to emails.

reviews.subject: English
reviews.review: Good class with interesting reading material. Discussions are insightful.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Average class. Material can be confusing at times, but Dr. Wilson is approachable.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Incredible professor! His lectures are thought-provoking and engaging.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Enjoyed the course, very interactive and Dr. Hernandez encourages participation.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Decent professor, but sometimes hard to keep up with the pace of the class.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Clark is amazing! She makes complex concepts easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject, and it shows in his lectures.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Good professor, but the course can be tough if you don't keep up with the work.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Fantastic! His practical approach to problem-solving is very helpful.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Engaging and passionate about the subject. The class was enjoyable.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Great professor with a lot of real-world experience. The course was very informative.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. King is brilliant! Her lectures are insightful, and she makes learning fun.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Average class. The professor is knowledgeable, but the material can be dry.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Interesting course with a lot of discussion. Dr. Adams is very knowledgeable.
